title: Maspalomas bow-legged grasshopper
text: The Maspalomas bow-legged grasshopper ("Dericorys minutus") is a species of <a href="grasshopper">grasshopper</a> of the family <a href="Acrididae">Acrididae</a>. The species is endemic to the town of <a href="Maspalomas">Maspalomas</a> on <a href="Gran%20Canaria">Gran Canaria Island</a>, and is considered <a href="Critically%20endangered">Critically endangered</a>, or almost extinct, since it hasn't been found since 1949.
